identified-content.object.title: X-Files, the (TV Program)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: The X-Files television series will be back for final season in fall, but participation of its star, David Duchovny, is undecided; Gillian Anderson, co-star, has signed to appear in all episodes of show (S)

block.p: After a long period of doubt, ''The X-Files'' will be back for a final season in the fall, representatives of the show's creator, Chris Carter, confirmed yesterday.
Still undecided is the particiption of the series' star, David Duchovny. He remains in negotiations over how many episodes he will act in, with reports ranging from as few as six to as many as 16.
After a long period of doubt, ''The X-Files'' will be back for a final season in the fall, representatives of the show's creator, Chris Carter, confirmed yesterday.
Still undecided is the particiption of the series' star, David Duchovny. He remains in negotiations over how many episodes he will act in, with reports ranging from as few as six to as many as 16.
But the Fox network will have a full season of ''The X-Files'' to hold down its 9 p.m slot on Sunday nights, and the co-star, Gillian Anderson, is signed to play in all of them.
